quoteText: Some services that we use (including Third Party Services), such as Google Analytics, use web tags and may also place their own cookies on your browser, and individual blogs on our network may contain code that places their own cookies.
title: Tumblr requires third party cookies

tosdr.case: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.
tosdr.tldr: Tumblr places third-party cookies such as Google Analytics and Quantcast, whose behavior is not subject to their Privacy Policy.
